forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West northwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a canvas of pristine blue, the sun casting its warm gaze over the city’s iconic skyline. With a gentle breeze flowing in from the west, the warmth feels inviting, tempered just enough to remind us of the city’s character. The temperature hovers around a pleasant 65 degrees, offering a nice reprieve from the chill that often lingers in this coastal environment. As daylight fades, the clear sky will transition to a slightly warmer night, with temperatures rising to nearly 58 degrees, all while the wind lingers at a comfortable whisper.

With visibility stretching across the bay, there’s no sign of the infamous fog that often embraces the Golden Gate; instead, today invites quiet spontaneity—a stroll through Dolores Park or a leisurely bike ride along the Embarcadero. Those venturing outdoors might consider a light jacket or sweater to accompany their afternoon exploration, as the winds pick up slightly in the evening. Whether you're meeting friends at a local café or enjoying the peacefulness of the waterfront, this serene day encourages a relaxed embrace of all that the city has to offer, wrapped in the promise of a beautiful San Francisco evening.
